   contain the root `toctree` directive.

tinycolors documentation
========================

This is the documentation for the `tinycolors` library, a tiny, useful, and readable color library for fast colors.
tinycolors is a Python library that provides simple and efficient tools for color manipulation and representation.
Complete with support for various color formats and easy-to-use functions, tinycolors is designed to make working with colors in Python a breeze.

Unfortunately, the documentation is still a work in progress. Please check back later for more comprehensive guides and references.
For now, you can explore the API reference below.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4
   :caption: Contents:

   api/tinycolors
